comment: There are three major assignments that all build up to a final essay. Easy class, but you really have to keep up on your own because it was a hybrid class 50% online. He's super chill but i didn't get much feedback on any of my work
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Professor Lawson is a pretty relaxed teacher that will give you insightful feedback on your assignment submissions. He also provides extra credit opportunities that give you up to five points on assignments as well. Overall, probably the best English class I've taken.

Very chill teacher, essays were majority of your final grade. Discussions and vlog posts weekly, very lenient of when some of them could be turned in. Gives extra credit if you take your paper to the writing center. Lectures were online and you expected to watch them before class. Not a terrible class to take, but there are easier English classes.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Weird class -his lectures were recorded (like a virtual class) and class time was for projects and questions.  Teaching this way means there's no interaction, you can't ask for clarification during a lecture.  His office time was limited.  As this was a writing class, his opinion meant everything, meaning if he didn't like you, you were doomed.

A professor with a great sense of humor. Very understanding when you reach out to him about assignments and whatnot. He does grade toughly, however. Lots of constant small and easy assignments, and 4 big assignments, including a group final project for the class (NO FINAL EXAM). I'd recommend this class to most of my friends.
Overall good, very kind, sense of humor, just do what he tells you to.

Best professor I've had. Very clear on what needs to be in papers and I never got below a 95. He's very fun and his class was always interesting. As long as you communicate with him he is willing to give extensions. Many extra credit opportunities, no tests, and just an all-around great teacher.

The teacher was pretty fun and although there was a hefty amount of writing assignments, there were no big test or quizzes of any nature except for like one pop quiz. I would recommend to always show up to class because sometimes there were in class assignments due same day. I think there was a textbook but i didnt look at once and still passed.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--So many papers
